name: Innovation&Perfect
0:
”Alexa, turn on "Light Name".”
”Alexa, brighten "Light Name".”
”Alexa, make "Light Name" to 50%.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you turn on/off security light, adjust brightness and color temperature by voice. 
If you don't want to use app to control security light, you can order the light by this skill easily.
You don't have to find your phone to control it.
You just speak to alexa device and control it.
